Mark Holloway - Blog Info

This blog is based on the excellent Hyde theme (v2.1.0) for Poole, using Ruby and Jekyll, running on Github Pages but with some modifications:

  • User Comments using Disqus
  • Tags for blog posts
  • Blog post archive
  • Excerpts (Read moreâ€¦) on main page
  • Rouge syntax highlighter and a modified version of dracula.css
  • Google Analytics
  • Video embeds with fluidvids.js
  • Switch to https if accessing site through http
  • Jekyll SEO

The source code for this blog is available on my github page here.
